short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension for checking websites that had been registered to the database of DelyKid.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser extension for checking websites that had been registered to the database of Delykid.

Solana Genuine Link can be used to check the website you are opening. Those websites which had been registered in Delykid database is trusted and save to visit.

After installing the extension, open it and click 'Check Website' to check the website you are visiting. There will be a pop-up/mini window that appears via the extension window which will give response based on the website, whether it is registered or not.
